text_content: Iâ€™m bullish on $BNB

âš¡  Notable Crypto Acquisition in Autumn 2025  A range of major acquisitions marked the year, including moves from Coinbase, Binance $BNB , Farcaster, Lombard, Gate, and Chiliz, alongside other platforms across exchanges, wallets, and infrastructure.

BNB Chain Core Contributor @cz_binance hosted an AMA at #BNBHack Abu Dhabi, covering builders, AI, privacy, decentralization, RWAs and where onchain innovation is heading.

Hereâ€™s a breakdown of the key ideas he shared ðŸ§µðŸ‘‡ 
CZ joined builders at #BNBHack in Abu Dhabi and shared a clear message:

Hackathons are a starting point, short-term wins matter less than the long-term journey.

He reminded developers that building in crypto means constant iteration. You pivot, you fail, you improve and you keep going. The market decides the true winners over time.
On bringing culture onchain, CZ said IP can thrive on blockchain, but simply uploading content is not enough.

New models like micropayments, interactivity and global monetisation will unlock real adoption.

BNB Chain welcomes this experimentation. 
Privacy came up as a major theme with CZ calling it a basic human right.

He noted that blockchain today is often too transparent and that users should have the option to transact and trade privately, while still meeting compliance requirements. 
On decentralisation, CZ explained that it is not a binary concept, it exists on a spectrum.

Node count, team control, governance and performance trade-offs all play a role.

The goal is continual improvement over time. 
He also spoke about AIâ€™s role in trading and future onchain activity.

AI agents will handle millions of small transactions. This will require extremely fast blockchains that can support high throughput at low cost.

BNB Chainâ€™s performance roadmap is aimed squarely at this future.
RWAs show long-term promise, especially stablecoins, but assets like buildings and equities still face liquidity and regulatory hurdles.

BNB Chain already supports one of the most active stablecoin environments, with almost $2B in total asset value*, giving the ecosystem an advantage as the category matures.

*Source: @DefiLlama
Sectors with the most potential on BNB Chain include AI, stablecoins, derivatives and prediction markets.

Breakout categories tend to emerge from strong teams, not hype cycles.

BNB Chain can also become the home for AI-driven applications. That progress depends on direct input from developers, which is why community feedback shapes so much of the chainâ€™s roadmap.
CZ closed by saying crypto gives builders opportunities that traditional finance never could. Small teams can build meaningful products.

BNB Chain will continue supporting the developers who choose to build for the long term.

â€œIf I put $10,000 in BNB in 2017 Iâ€™d have $60M now.â€


No.


If you bought $10,000 of $BNB in 2017 and watched it go to:


$10k â†’ $790K â†’ $1.15M


and did nothing


Then watched $1.15M go to $260k


and still did nothing


Then watched $260k go to $2.66M


and still did nothing


Then watched $2.66M wither to $433K


and still did nothing


Then watched $433K surge to $45M


and still did nothing


Then watched $45M deteriorate to $14.8M


Then watched $14.8M climb to $46.6M


and still did nothing


Then watched $46.6M shrink to $13.3M
and still did nothing


Then watched $13.3M surge to $60M


and then for some reason finally decided to do somethingâ€¦


Then yes, $10K in 2017 would be worth $60M today.

Our Executive Director of Growth, @nina_rong, shared how BNB Chain is tackling one of the industryâ€™s biggest challenges: solving discovery and turning innovation into tradable liquidity at #BinanceBlockchainWeek.

Here is a breakdown of her keynote ðŸ§µ  ðŸ‘‡ 
The industry has a discovery issue.

There are 716 million people who own crypto, yet fewer than 10% use anything onchain.

Most users cannot find products whilst more products can't reach liquidity.

This is why activity sits with only a handful of protocols while thousands see almost none ðŸ‘‡
BNB Chain already has the ingredients needed to fix discovery.

There are already:
ðŸ”¸ $48B in assets on the network.
ðŸ”¸ $14B in stablecoins.
ðŸ”¸ 700+ million wallets.
ðŸ”¸ 1000+ deployed projects, including ones from @BlackRock, @FTDA_US and CMBI.

This scale is what makes real discovery possible.
Efficient discovery depends on fast and predictable execution.

BNB Chain has:
âœ… Reduced gas fees from 15 gwei to 0.05
âœ… Lowered block time from 3 seconds to 0.45 seconds
âœ… Improved finality from 45 seconds to 1.125 seconds
âœ… Increased TPS from 150 to 6000

This creates an environment where liquidity can move quickly without unnecessary risk.
BNB Chain has also been shaped by years of focused development.

With 619 BEPs and 20 hardforks, the network has become a stable and reliable base layer. Real discovery cannot grow on fragile infrastructure.

The ecosystem also supports builders beyond the protocol:

ðŸ”¸ BNB Hacks help early teams test ideas and meet users, while BNB Trenches keeps them moving after the event
ðŸ”¸  When teams begin raising, the $1B Builder Fund from @yzilabs helps refine the product and prepare a real go-to-market plan
ðŸ”¸ Once projects are ready for users, BNB Chainâ€™s BD & marketing teams help them reach the right communities

Discovery requires visibility, and the ecosystem helps direct it to builders who are ready.
The roadmap pushes discovery further:

BNB Chain is:
ðŸ”¸ Working toward sub-second finality
ðŸ”¸ Targeting 20,000 TPS for advanced DeFi
ðŸ”¸ Rolling out plug-and-play developer libraries
ðŸ”¸ Improving the UX to match Web2 simplicity with Web3 transparency

The goal is a simple user experience with transparent onchain activity underneath.
BNB Chain is where discovery can scale because liquidity, users, infrastructure and builder support all exist in one place, and anyone can take part.

ðŸ”¸ Liquidity providers can explore opportunities in the ecosystem.
ðŸ”¸ Users can try BNB Chain projects and attend demo days.
ðŸ”¸ Builders can join BNB Hacks or apply to upcoming programs.

The ecosystem is ready for people who want to build.

Week in BNB Chain: Builders Ship, Mid Caps Rip

 BTC holds above $92K! Altcoin Season Index stuck at 16! BNB Chain mcap +0.4% (~+$0.8B)! Mid caps lead while on-chain activity cools off.

Letâ€™s dive into this weekâ€™s BNB moves. ðŸ§µ

1/7 
ðŸ“ˆ Market Overview

BTC holds above $92K pre-Fed while alts lag. Altcoin Season Index at 16 shows clear BTC dominance. BNB Chain edges up 0.4% (~$0.8B) even as DEX volumes and fees slip. Ethereum sectorâ€™s ~4% WoW gain still leads majors.

2/7
ðŸ“Š Mid Caps Take the Wheel

BNB Chain gains are driven by $100Mâ€“$250M mid caps instead of majors. Sector breadth improves as more BEP-20 names print green, hinting at early risk-on rotation rather than a single-token-led bounce.

3/7
ðŸ† Weekly Standout Tokens

 ðŸ”¹ Audiera (BEAT) +52.5% after its first 125,000 BEAT burn tied to AI payments revenue.
 ðŸ”¹ Folks Finance (FOLKS) +48.6% as airdrop claims open and Wormhole NTT multichain expansion goes live.

4/7 
ðŸ“Š Quiet Winners

 ðŸ”¹ River (RIVER) +50.1% with no clear single catalyst.
 ðŸ”¹ Pieverse (PIEVERSE) +43.5% amid growing BNB Chain small-cap speculation.

Speculators are clearly hunting upside at the long tail of the sector.
